name: .ZXP
summary: Learn about .ZXP files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can use the Unified Plugin Installer Agent (UPIA) command-line tool that is installed with the Adobe Creative Cloud desktop application (Windows, Mac) to install the extension a ZXP file contains. To learn how, refer to Adobe's instructions for using the UPIA command-line tool.
